home.heroSubtitle: Find strength and peace through God's word — one verse at a time.
home.trendingSubtitle: Explore Bible verses by theme, book, or life situation

about.whatIsContent: Get a random Bible verse in one click. Use this free random scripture generator to discover daily Bible verses about faith, love, hope, strength, and peace. Save your favorites or come back anytime for more inspiration.
about.howItWorksStep1: Click Generate Verse to instantly receive a random Bible verse.
about.howItWorksStep2: Copy to share your verse with friends, family, or on social media.
about.howItWorksStep3: Begin your Verse of the Day habit for daily reflection and encouragement.
about.whatCanYouDoTitle: What Can You Do With This Bible Verse Generator?
about.whyUseTitle: Why Use a Random Bible Verse Generator？
about.isFreeContent: Yes — this Bible verse generator is completely free to use. No sign-ups, no downloads, no limits. Simply click Generate Verse, and a new Bible verse will appear instantly to inspire your day.
about.startNowContent: Generate a random Bible verse and begin your Verse of the Day journey — free, fast, and always uplifting.
